> sim_arrival = function(n){
+     vec <- vector()
+     x <- runif(n,0,60) - runif(n,0,60)
+     for (i in 1:n){
+         vec[i] <- max(x[i],0)
+     }
+     return(vec)
+ }
> sim_result <- mean(sim_arrival(1000))
> print(sim_result)
[1] 9.968723
> sim_result <- mean(sim_arrival(1000))
> print(sim_result)
[1] 10.21018
> sim_result <- mean(sim_arrival(1000))
> print(sim_result)
[1] 9.997173
> sim_result <- sim_arrival(1000)
> print(mean(sim_result))
[1] 9.831283
> res <- ecdf(sim_result)
